   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to ts_forecaster's documentation!
=========================================
ts_forecaster is a time series library designed to provide multiple forecasting approaches.

It offers various models and algorithms for analyzing and forecasting time series as well as additional tools. 

This Documentation provides an overview of the library, installation instructions, and usage examples.


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Documentation:

   src
